text:
="preserve">Rosemarie Müller-Streisand (11 August 1923 – 26 June 2020) was a German church historian, theologian and teacher. In 1963 she became a professor and in 1969 she was a main person of church history at the Humboldt University in Berlin. She retired in 1983.
Müller-Streisand died in Berlin on 26 June 2020, aged 96.
